example.parse: (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ اذا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS شاءت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تدحض) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (UCP-OBJ (SBAR-NOM (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تبنا) (NP-OBJ (NP (PVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مجلس) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامن))))))

arg.g: the position adopted by the Security Counci
